_header: Peace lordings I pray you peace
Bibliographic Ghosts: London, British Library Addit. 25719: not in this MS.
_description: The Knight who Refused to Abjure Our Lady — 36 lines in 6-line stanzas

DurArchDun60.First Lines:
Pes lordyngs I pray ȝow pesAnd of ȝoure noys ȝe
                    styne & ses…
DurArchDun60.Last Lines:
…he kep ȝow all þat herid hell& [sithen] [
                    ]cched
DurArchDun60.Note:
Fragment: on deposit Durham University Library, Archives and Special
                    Collections.
